Package com.studing.cashRegister.dao

Class OrderDao

java.lang.Object
com.studing.cashRegister.dao.OrderDao
public class OrderDao
extends java.lang.Object
Class for Data access object to 'order' and 'goods_order' tables. Singleton.
Author:
tHolubets
